subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Darren Clarke rallied from four shots down to win the Iberdrola Open in Son Servera, Spain, by three strokes after the overnight leader, Chris Wood, faltered on the back nine.
snippet: Darren Clarke rallied from four shots down to win the Iberdrola Open in Son Servera, Spain, by three strokes after the overnight leader, Chris Wood, faltered on the back nine.
